detailsData.title: Excellence
detailsData.content: Recognized by peers and legal industry for legal abilities and service to the community.

detailsData.title: Personal Attention & Service
detailsData.content: Clients are top priority, with direct access to attorneys and personalized service.

detailsData.title: No Fee Unless We Win
detailsData.content: Most cases on contingency fee basis, advancing costs to pursue cases.

address: 2801 E. Spring Street, Suite 200, Long Beach, CA 90806
subHeading: Full-service law firm focused on personalized service and compassionate representation.
valueProp: Lallande Law, PLC is a full-service law firm focused on providing clients with personalized service and compassionate representation in the pursuit of justice.
CTA: PROVIDE US WITH SOME INFORMATION AND SCHEDULE A FREE CASE EVALUATION

testimonalData.text: I used to have this mentality that lawyer is heartless, but not this one. Mr. Lallande has a huge genuine heart and will never leave your side.
testimonalData.author: Lizette C.

testimonalData.text: Mr. Lallande and his team were incredibly supportive and fought for justice on my behalf. I am forever grateful for their dedication.
testimonalData.author: John D.

testimonalData.text: The professionalism and care shown by Lallande Law exceeded my expectations. They truly care about their clients and their pursuit of justice.
testimonalData.author: Sarah M.
